personal_vacations.ai-prompt:
Please parse the following email request and give me the dates that this person wants to go on vacation as a json in the following format:{ "name": PERSON_NAME, "start_date": START_DATE, "end_date": END_DATE }
If there are multiple vacation date periods, please return multiple json.
Please reply only with the json without any other text.
You should ensure that all dates returned should be after today
